column4: hey i'm try intall 7.04 server on this asus p4p800 mobo, i tried 2 diff hard drives and 2 diff ide cables and it always hangs formatting at 33%

hey i've been trying to install all night, i use different hdd, ubuntu cds, alternate, desktop, ect.. it always hangs when i try to format my drive at 33 percent, if i use another app to format, it hangs when copying linux-server package. i swapped my memory also..
did you make sure the cd or harddrive are ok?
